SELECT s.view_id, s.bundle_id, s.seqno, s.state, s.config, s.startup, s.bundleinstance, b.name FROM oskari_view_bundle_seq s, oskari_bundle b WHERE view_id = #{view_id} AND s.bundle_id = b.id ORDER BY s.seqno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oskari_view ( name, "description", type, application_dev_prefix, page, application, uuid, only_uuid, domain, lang, creator, is_public, is_default, metadata) VALUES ( #{name}, #{description}, #{type}, #{developmentPath}, #{page}, #{application}, '$uuid$', true, #{pubDomain}, #{lang}, #{creator}, #{isPublic}, #{isDefault}, #{metadataAsString} ) RETURNING id
mapper.update: UPDATE oskari_view SET used=now(), usagecount=(SELECT usagecount+1 FROM oskari_view WHERE id=#{id}) WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oskari_view_bundle_seq (view_id, bundle_id, seqno, state, config, bundleinstance) VALUES ( #{viewId}, #{bundleId}, #{seqNo}, #{state}, #{config}, #{bundleinstance}) RETURNING view_id
